source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_00<tab>Her heart laid bare, Ryne appears to be at peace again.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_00<tab>エクセドラ大広場のリーンは、晴れやかな様子だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_01<tab>Having bade the people of the Crystarium an emotional farewell, the moment has come for your fellow Scions to depart for the Source. Together with Ryne, you make your way to the Ocular, where your friends have gathered for the final time.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_01<tab>リーンとともに、仲間たちと合流することになった。クリスタリウムの星見の間にいる「ベーク＝ラグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_02<tab>The air is heavy with anticipation as you take your place in the chamber, and you try unsuccessfully not to think about all the things that could go wrong. After a moment's hesitation, you give the signal to proceed, and Beq Lugg commences the ritual, directing the Scions to commit first their memories to the spirit vessels, and then their very souls. The deed duly done, the crystals and their precious contents are entrusted to your safekeeping. All that remains is for you to step into the mirror and see your friends home.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_02<tab>ベーク＝ラグと話した。仲間たちの記憶と魂を携え、石の家へと帰還しよう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_03<tab>It is an otherwise ordinary day when you throw open the doors of the Rising Stones and step into its familiar surrounds, but the Twelve know your purpose is anything but ordinary. A few words are enough to convey this fact to Krile and Tataru, who share a tense look before ushering you to the infirmary. The spirit vessels safely in place, you wait with bated breath...and heave a sigh of relief as, one by one, your friends awaken in their own bodies once more. As far as you have come, however, one soul remains to be restored to its rightful home, and thus do you return to the road, bound for the beacon of hope that gleams in the distance...

Some days later, it is with great jubilation that the Scions welcome a new addition to their ranks: a bright-eyed youth named G'raha Tia. And together with comrades old and new, you set your sights upon the many adventures still to come.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_03<tab>新たな仲間も含め、暁の帰還が果たされた。石の家の「グ・ラハ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_04<tab>Though you have reached a momentous malmstone in your journey, the road stretches on to places beyond imagining. Yet whatever may lie ahead, and whatever hardships you may face, you have faith that your experiences in the First will give you the strength to forge ever onward.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SEQ_04<tab>グ・ラハ・ティアから改めて挨拶を受けた。第一世界での思い出や、そこで受け取った想いは、冒険者と仲間たちを導き支えていくことだろう。戦いはひとつの節目を迎えたが、まだ終わりではない。冒険は、どこまでだって続いていく。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Beq Lugg in the Ocular.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_TODO_00<tab>星見の間のベーク＝ラグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Beq Lugg in the Ocular.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_TODO_01<tab>星見の間のベーク＝ラグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_100_000<tab>Oh? Begging your pardon, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but should you not wait for Mistress Ryne?
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_100_000<tab>おや、リーンさんはお連れしなくてよろしいのですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_RYNE_000_000<tab>Well, I suppose it's time. Are you ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_RYNE_000_000<tab>……さあ、そろそろ時間ですね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの準備は大丈夫ですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_RYNE_000_001<tab>All right. Let's not keep the others waiting.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_RYNE_000_001<tab>それなら、ベーク＝ラグさんのところに行きましょう。
私も、みなさんをお見送りしますね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_005<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have but this moment shown your associates in. Strange to think that I will not have the honor of showing them out again...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_005<tab>公がご不在であれ、あなた方ならば塔の中にお通しします。
ですが……こうして大勢をご案内するのは、
これで最後になるかもしれませんね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_006<tab>But I am informed that you yourself may yet return, and I look forward to welcoming you on that happy day. Now, if you would care to follow me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_006<tab>というわけで、より一層の誠意を込めて……
「星見の間」まで、ご案内いたしましょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I did not expect such a rousing farewell from the people. It was the very thing my spirits needed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>クリスタリウムの皆が盛大に見送ってくれたおかげで、
寂しくなっていた気持ちが奮い立ったよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Now all that remains is to return to the Source. The Twelve know we have made Krile and Tataru worry long enough.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>あとは笑顔で「石の家」に帰って、
タタルやクルルさんを安心させるだけだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>Angelo stands ready to work his magick on our souls.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>アンジェロの方は準備万端よ。
魂を不活性化して、魔具に収まるようにしてみせるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Since we cannot take our worldly goods with us, I want you to have my gunblade.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_THANCRED_000_020<tab>俺たちは、装備の類いも持っていけないからな……
そのガンブレードは、お前がもらってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_THANCRED_000_021<tab>Use it or sell it, it's all the same to me. So long as it serves you in some way, I will be satisfied.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_THANCRED_000_021<tab>好きに使ってくれて構わないし、
そうでなくても、売れば多少の金にはなるだろう。
お前の助けになれれば、何にせよ本望だ。

TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_RYNE_000_025<tab>サンクレッド……私、大事にしますね。
このガンブレードも、これまで教えてもらったことも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_URIANGER_000_030<tab>How many times have we few assembled thus in this storied chamber? Many and more, I think.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_URIANGER_000_030<tab>この部屋に、何度こうして集ってきたことでしょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_URIANGER_000_031<tab>Were the Exarch standing before us, the scene would be complete. Nay─'twould be complete were he standing before us <var 1A 02 /var>with Emet-Selch smirking in the wings<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_URIANGER_000_031<tab>私たちの前に水晶公が立ち、
いちばん後ろには、少し離れてエメトセルクが立っていた。
そんな日々を、すでに懐かしく感じております……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>In the spirit of solidarity...I bid you carry the vessels as if <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> life depended on it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>プレッシャーになってもいけないから、一言だけ……
魔具に収まった私たちの運搬を頼むわね、「闇の戦士」さま。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_040<tab>Ah, there you are. I take it you are ready for the journey.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_040<tab>ああ、おぬしも来たか。
ソウル・サイフォンなら、すっかり準備できておるぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_041<tab>The spirit vessels are primed, and our company complete. At a word from you, we shall begin.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_041<tab>運び手たるおぬしの決心もついたのであれば、
皆の記憶と魂を込めようと思うが……どうだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Upon beginning the soul-imbuing ritual, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>これより物語が大きく進展するため、
カットシーンが連続して再生されます。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>しばらく時間がかかるため、
十分にプレイ時間を確保したうえで、
続きを進めることを、お勧めいたします。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_Q2_000_044<tab>Begin the soul-imbuing ritual and return to the Source with your comrades?
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_045<tab>Very good. I shall distribute the vessels at once.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_BEQLUGG_000_045<tab>承知した。
では、皆に魔具を配るとしよう。
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_Q3_000_050<tab>メインクエストを進行させますか？

TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_060<tab>ああ、そっちも戻ってきたか。
おつかれさま、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_062<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do you think I was...excessively familiar earlier? In my tone and mannerism?
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_062<tab>や、やっぱり……あの挨拶、ダメだったか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_063<tab>I thought it better to be familiar than formal if we are to be comrades. But now I worry that it may have detracted from the gratitude and respect I harbor for everyone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_063<tab>いやでも、いまさら威厳を出すのも違うだろ。
みんなには本当に感謝してるし、尊敬もしてるんだ。
だから今度は一介の……ただの仲間になりたくて……

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_064<tab>Perhaps we might consider it a nod to my regrettably less-than-humble beginnings...? Yes! Yes, that will do!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_064<tab>それで、その、初心にかえったつもりで……だな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_065<tab><sigh> Being free to live as one pleases is not without its challenges... In a way, it was easier when I had a mission that consumed my every waking moment. It provided me with a focus, a constant push in a singular direction.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_065<tab>うぅ……。
肩書や使命があったときには、もっと、勢いでいけたんだ。
好きにしろって言われた方が難しいだろ、これ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_066<tab>By the way, was casting spells <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> so draining? I had quite forgotten what it was like to do it without the tower. I've rarely felt so exhausted. Or <var 1A 02 /var>hungry<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_066<tab>それに、塔に頼らず魔法を使うのが、
こんなに消耗することだったなんて……。
普通に眠くなるわ腹が減るわで……びっくりした……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_067<tab>Yet if all I did was bend the bow, I would be of limited use to you on your adventures. So I shall persevere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_067<tab>けど、弓だけじゃ、
あんたに連れてってもらう機会が減るかもしれないだろ？
だからいいんだこれで……すぐ慣れてみせるしな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_068<tab>Whoever I might have been before, I am now a Scion─and an inexperienced Scion at that. A green initiate, eager to learn how best to contribute to the cause...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_068<tab>そんなわけで、「暁」の新入り……
彼方では水晶公と呼ばれた、今はただのグ・ラハ・ティアだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_069<tab>...That he might follow in the footsteps of his inspiration!
target: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_GRAHATIA_000_069<tab>これからもよろしくな、オレの……いちばんの英雄！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>G'raha Tia is now available as a Trust companion.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI112_03782_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>「フェイス」で選択できる仲間の幻体に、
オールラウンダー「グ・ラハ・ティア」が追加されました！
